title: Golem's ACS Icon & Department Logo Page
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:pride-highlighter |inc-demi= --]]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[module css]]

.icons {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(5, calc((100% / 5) - 0.25rem));
    grid-gap: 0.25rem;
}

@media (max-width: 500px ) {
    .icons {
     grid-template-columns: repeat(3, calc((100% / 3) - 0.25rem));
    }
}

.icon_image {
    border-radius: 50%;
    border: 0.25rem solid  rgb(0,0,0);
    overflow: hidden;
}

.icon_name,
.icon_link {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    text-transform: uppercase;
}

[[/module]]

+++ Created a Department but can't find a logo to use for it? Want to use an esoteric class but couldn't find an icon for it?
++++ Then this is the place for you!

------

Welcome to [[*user GreenGolem]]'s ACS Icon and Department Logo page. Here I put all my department logos and class icons for free use.

Feel free to use any of the artworks present here. Though with the Departments I have a little rule: Don't use an artwork of mine that is already being used for another piece. I will have a message reading ##green|{{[NOT IN USE]}}## or ##red|{{[IN USE]}}## under each Department logo to tell you if it is currently being used in a published article.

If you use a department icon that I created, make sure to credit me, and then feel free to change the bottom of the logo to ##red|{{[IN USE]}}## (After said article is posted).

If you wish to request me to make a logo or icon, please message me on discord with the username green_golem.

------

[[tabview]]
[[tab Department Logos]]
[[=image DeptOfMultigalacticRelations.png width="300px"]]
[[=]]
##green|{{[NOT IN USE]}}##
[[/=]]
> My first department icon. I was really just trying to learn how to make icons by this point, so this may not be in the best shape. The idea for this one is "Department of Multi-Galactic Relations".

[[=image DeptOfReligiousWarfare.png width="300px"]]
[[=]]
##green|{{[NOT IN USE]}}##
[[/=]]
> My second one. A little abstract, but it works. The idea for this one is "Department of Religious Warfare".

[[=image AuguryDepartment.png width="300px"]]
[[=]]
##green|{{[NOT IN USE]}}##
[[/=]]
> This one is something that I am quite pleased with myself on. The idea behind this one is the "Augury[[footnote]]An occult science based around the interpretation and prediction using omens.[[/footnote]] Department".

[[=image ContagionDepartment.png width="300px"]]
[[=]]
##green|{{[NOT IN USE]}}##
[[/=]]
> This one is probably the one I am least proud of, but here it is. The idea for this one is the "Contagion[[footnote]]The spread of harmful ideas or practices. In occult terms, it is referencing the "Law of Contagion", which is the idea that interacting with something paranormal leaves a link between the paranormal and whatever was interacted with. The Contagion Department would focus on studying and breaking said links when they come up in real life.[[/footnote]] Department".

[[=image OverwatchCommand.png width="300px"]]
[[=]]
##green|{{[NOT IN USE]}}##
[[/=]]
> Another abstract one, but I like it overall. This one is my current take on the Overwatch Command.

[[=image ProtoPostFoundation.png width="300px"]]
[[=]]
##green|{{[NOT IN USE]}}##
[[/=]]
> This one deviates from the original Foundation logo format. The idea for this one is some form of Proto-Foundation or Post-Collapse-Foundation.

[[=image MiscLogo1.png width="300px"]]
[[=]]
##green|{{[NOT IN USE]}}##
[[/=]]
> This was not made for any department in particular. I tested out a couple different patterns, and came out with this! I was told this looks like one of those handles on submarine doors, so there is that!

[[=image MemeticsDivision.png width="300px"]]
[[=]]
##green|{{[NOT IN USE]}}##
[[/=]]
> I made this logo for the "Memetics Department". Tried my best to make it look spooky!

[[=image AntimemeticLogo.png width="300px"]]
[[=]]
##red|{{[IN USE]}}##
[[/=]]
> This one is probably one of my more favorite ones. The idea for this one was a logo for the Antimemetics Division.

[[=image AdministratorDept.png width="300px"]]
[[=]]
##green|{{[NOT IN USE]}}##
[[/=]]
> Here's one intended for "The Office of the Administrator".
[[/tab]]
